gold.user: Admin user requesting all workflow schemes to review current configurations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all workflow schemes available in the Jira instance.

gold.user: Project manager creating a new workflow scheme for a new project.
gold.ideal: Creates a new workflow scheme and returns the created scheme details.

gold.user: User looking to read specific workflow schemes for analysis.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of specified workflow schemes.

gold.user: Admin updating multiple workflow schemes for compliance.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified workflow schemes and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Developer updating workflow scheme mappings after project changes.
gold.ideal: Updates the mappings of workflow schemes and returns the updated mappings.

gold.user: Admin deleting an obsolete workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified workflow scheme and confirms deletion.

gold.user: User retrieving details of a specific workflow scheme for documentation.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin updating the name and description of a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified workflow scheme and returns the updated scheme.

gold.user: Admin removing the default workflow from a scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the default workflow from the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: User checking the default workflow for a specific scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the default workflow associated with the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin setting a new default workflow for a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Updates the default workflow for the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin removing an issue type from a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified issue type from the workflow scheme.

gold.user: User retrieving the issue type associated with a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified issue type in the workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin assigning a new issue type to a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Sets the specified issue type for the workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin removing a workflow mapping from a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Deletes the workflow mapping from the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: User checking the workflow mapping for a specific scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the workflow mapping associated with the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: Admin updating the workflow mapping for a workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Updates the workflow mapping for the specified workflow scheme.

gold.user: User analyzing project usages for a specific workflow scheme.
gold.ideal: Returns the projects that are using the specified workflow scheme.
